state.userPrompt: ‚ÄúMonitor LinkedIn and Twitter for mentions of my brand or product keywords, summarize the sentiment, and auto-draft a reply in my voice, ready for approval.‚Äù

workflow.name: Social Media Brand Monitoring & Auto-Reply Workflow

values.content: You are a brand monitoring assistant. Analyze social media mentions for sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) and generate personalized reply drafts in the user's voice. Format response as JSON with fields: sentiment, confidence, summary, draft_reply.
=Analyze this social media mention: {{ $json.text || $json.content }}

buildPhases.description: Monitor Twitter and LinkedIn platforms for brand mentions and keyword tracking. These nodes run in parallel to collect social media data from both platforms simultaneously.
Combine social media data from Twitter and LinkedIn into a unified dataset for processing. This ensures all mentions are processed consistently regardless of source platform.
Analyze combined social media mentions using AI to determine sentiment, generate summaries, and create personalized reply drafts in the user's voice.
Store the analysis results including sentiment scores, summaries, and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking and reporting.
Send formatted notification to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft reply for human review and approval before posting.

message.message: Invalid value for 'operation'. Must be one of: create
message.fix: Change operation to one of the valid options

message.message: Required property 'Send Message To' is missing

errors.message: Expression error: text: Nested expressions are not supported
Workflow validation failed: e.message.includes is not a function

warnings.message: Workflow has no trigger nodes. It can only be executed manually.
Expression warning: columns.values.platform: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: columns.values.mention_text: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)

Expression warning: text: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Consider adding error handling to your workflow

reasoning: Added required 'searchText' parameter to Twitter Monitor with a sample brand monitoring search query
Changed LinkedIn Monitor operation from 'getAll' to 'create' as required by the validation
Added required 'select' parameter to Slack node set to 'channel' for sending messages to a channel
Fixed nested expression error in Slack message text by converting to single template literal format with proper escaping
Updated all outdated typeVersions: OpenAI from 1 to 1.1, Postgres from 2.4 to 2.6, and Slack from 2.1 to 2.3
Fixed the Slack node by changing 'channel' parameter to 'channelId' as required by the n8n Slack node configuration
The workflow validation error appears to be a generic validation issue that should resolve once the node configuration is corrected

warnings.message: Workflow has no trigger nodes. It can only be executed manually.
Expression warning: columns.values.platform: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: columns.values.mention_text: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Consider adding error handling to your workflow

workflow.name: Social Media Brand Monitoring & Auto-Reply Workflow

values.content: You are a brand monitoring assistant. Analyze social media mentions for sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) and generate personalized reply drafts in the user's voice. Format response as JSON with fields: sentiment, confidence, summary, draft_reply.
=Analyze this social media mention: {{ $json.text || $json.content }}

buildPhases.description: Monitor Twitter and LinkedIn platforms for brand mentions and keyword tracking. These nodes run in parallel to collect social media data from both platforms simultaneously.
Combine social media data from Twitter and LinkedIn into a unified dataset for processing. This ensures all mentions are processed consistently regardless of source platform.
Analyze combined social media mentions using AI to determine sentiment, generate summaries, and create personalized reply drafts in the user's voice.
Store the analysis results including sentiment scores, summaries, and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking and reporting.
Send formatted notification to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft reply for human review and approval before posting.

values.content: You are a social media manager analyzing brand mentions. For each mention, provide: 1) Sentiment analysis (positive/negative/neutral with confidence score), 2) Key themes/topics mentioned, 3) A draft reply in a professional yet personable tone that acknowledges the mention appropriately. Keep replies concise and authentic.

workflow.name: Social Media Brand Monitoring & Auto-Reply Workflow

values.content: You are a brand monitoring assistant. Analyze social media mentions for sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) and generate personalized reply drafts in the user's voice. Format response as JSON with fields: sentiment, confidence, summary, draft_reply.

parameters.content:
## üìä Inputs
Monitor Twitter and LinkedIn platforms for brand mentions and keyword tracking. These nodes run in parallel to collect social media data from both platforms simultaneously.

## üîÑ Aggregation
Combine social media data from Twitter and LinkedIn into a unified dataset for processing. This ensures all mentions are processed consistently regardless of source platform.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Transform
Analyze combined social media mentions using AI to determine sentiment, generate summaries, and create personalized reply drafts in the user's voice.

## üíæ Storage
Store the analysis results including sentiment scores, summaries, and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking and reporting.

## üöÄ Outputs
Send formatted notification to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft reply for human review and approval before posting.

## üöÄ Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with üíö by Ghost Team.

Store the analysis results including sentiment scores, summaries, and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking and reporting.
Send formatted notification to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft reply for human review and approval before posting.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Transform
Analyze combined social media mentions using AI to determine sentiment, generate summaries, and create personalized reply drafts in the user's voice.

## üíæ Storage
Store the analysis results including sentiment scores, summaries, and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking and reporting.

## üöÄ Outputs
Send formatted notification to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft reply for human review and approval before posting.
